column2: IDEA-104221 Console folding rules allow to add empty substring and after this console folding is not working anymore

column3:
Possible fix for IDEA-10221.
Please review.
This will look much nicer if you implement InputValidatorEx and return the error message from its getErrorText() method. Then you won't need to show the error message in a modal dialog.
Merged manually. Thanks a lot for your contribution!
